lead_paragraph: Singapore’s economy is improving after a volatile year in which it shrank for the first time since 2001, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said.
snippet: Singapore’s economy is improving after a volatile year in which it shrank for the first time since 2001, Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong said.

headline.main: Singapore Says Its Economy Is Set to Grow This Year
headline.print_headline: Singapore Says Its Economy Is Set To Grow This Year
